main event: An unidentified aerial phenomenon described as a vertical explosion breaking up in the sky was reported by an airlines pilot.
interesting points: The sighting reported a bright greenish burst breaking up into several parts., It had a vertical extension and faded away after a few seconds., The observation was made at an elevation of 20-30 degrees southeast., The pilot was flying a C-46 aircraft at 6000 feet., There were no activities in the area to account for the sighting.
sighted object: bright greenish burst breaking up in the sky
